title: Woman in Red
provenance_text:
Nicolai Cikovsky [1894-1987], New York, NY, until December 1944 [1]; Associated American Artists, Inc., New York, NY [2]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, January 1945.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 196 in "Painting in the United States" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October-December, 1944. The museum purchased it from this exhibition (through the artist's agent) in December 1944 and accessioned it the following month.
[2]. Acting as the artist's agent.
